recipesJson.name: White Chocolate Peppermint Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: wadeyloops
recipesJson.description:
VT Love and FLV White Chocolate - fix the white chocolate note in LB WCP.
VT Vanilla Cream and VIC for the ice cream.
FW CrÈme De Menthe supports the LB peppermint - you can adjust this to suit. I like it as is.
This recipe should get you close enough.
Sweeten/ cool to personal preference. I used 3 drops FW Sweetener in a 25ml.
